# Isolation Forest Example

This workflow is an example of applying an isolation forest to two dimensional data.

## Examples
The json input of a typical call of this workflow is
```
{
	"n_estimators": 100,
	"n_grid": 30,
	"x_min": -3,
	"x_max": 3,
	"y_min": -3,
```
